solution_line_template: The proportion of graphic novels is .15 because {num_graphic_novels} / {total_books} = <<{num_graphic_novels}/{total_books}={graphic_novel_proportion}>>{graphic_novel_proportion}
The percentage of graphic novels is 15 because {percent_factor} x {graphic_novel_proportion} = <<{percent_factor}*{graphic_novel_proportion}={graphic_novel_percent}>>{graphic_novel_percent}

The percentage of comic books is 20 because {percent_factor} - {novel_percent} - {graphic_novel_percent} = <<{percent_factor}-{novel_percent}-{graphic_novel_percent}={comic_book_percent}>>{comic_book_percent}
